text: Hagi Eliasibi'ma, Joiada'ma, Johanani'ma, Jaduakima, hu'za pristi eri'zama eri'naza knafi Livae nagate'ma ugota huterema hu'naza kva vahe'mokizmi zamagine, pristi eri'zama eri'naza naga'mokizmi zamagia mago avontafepi krente'naze. Hagi anazanke hu'za Dariusi'ma Pesia kinima mani'nea knafina ete mago'ane ana vahe'mokizmi zamagia kre'za erinte fatgo hu'naze.
